English: the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)

d.f: `太平~`洋~`濱~`臨~`我國~`東方~`一帶~`的~`海面~，`包括~`渤海~、`黃海~、`東海~`和南~`海~。

English: the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
